prompts: Create a legendary Pokemon that commands storms and has a majestic presence.
Show me a mythical creature with a powerful aura and the ability to control nature.
Imagine a ground and flying type Pokemon with a vibrant orange body and cloud-like features.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a thunderstorm with swirling clouds and earthy tones.
Generate a Pokemon character that looks like a guardian of the skies and mountains, showcasing its strength.
Make a Pokemon that blends in with its forest environment while having striking orange and brown colors.
Give me an image of a majestic Pokemon with a strong connection to the earth and sky.
